targets.query:
from(bucket: "influx")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ravendb_server")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "server_version" or r["_field"] == "certificate_server_certificate_expiration_left_in_sec")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "influx")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ravendb_server")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "license_expiration_left_in_sec")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "influx")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ravendb_server")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "cpu_process_usage")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: $__interval, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "max")

from(bucket: "influx")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ravendb_server")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "cpu_machine_usage")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: $__interval, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "influx")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu" or r["_measurement"] == "ravendb_server")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "network_requests_per_sec")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: $__interval, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "influx")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ravendb_server")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "memory_allocated_in_mb")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: $__interval, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "influx")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ravendb_server")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "memory_total_dirty_in_mb")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: $__interval, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "influx")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ravendb_server")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "memory_total_swap_usage_in_mb" or r["_field"] == "memory_total_swap_size_in_mb")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: $__interval, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "influx")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ravendb_server")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "uptime_in_sec")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: $__interval, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "influx")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ravendb_server")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "network_tcp_active_connections")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: $__interval, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "influx")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ravendb_server")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "disk_total_free_space_in_mb")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: $__interval, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "influx")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ravendb_server")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "backup_current_number_of_running_backups")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: $__interval, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES ON "telegraf" FROM "ravendb_databases" WITH KEY = "database_name"
list.name: Databases
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES ON "telegraf" FROM "ravendb_databases" WITH KEY = "database_name"
